ygData.subject: Up In Arms
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She watched Black Aracnia walk out of the lab.  She looked at her legs. She didn t want a drone to look after her. She didn t want anyone to look after.

Subject: Up In Arms
Message-ID: <8ncgp3+2td7@...>
In-Reply-To: <f.80ab3dc.26cb1e2a@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0

X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: logomorph@...

::DarkMouse::

She watched Black Aracnia walk out of the lab.  She looked at her 
legs. She didn't want a drone to look after her. She didn't want 
anyone to look after.  She wanted to go and fight with the others.  
She was feeling depressed by all this.  Her body wasn't working 
right. She was shaking and she couldn't transform.  She was stuck in 
this useless bot mode.  She hated being useless. She hated not being 
able to fight. She would rather be dead than have bots have to wait 
on her.  She tried to stand up and lean against the table.  But her 
legs just wouldn't hold her up.  She fell to the floor again.  She 
hit her fists against the floor as hard as she could.  She sat up and 
hit the table. She cut her hand on the table frame.  She saw her hand 
leaking. But it wasn't mech fluid.  It glowed and looked a different 
color. She stared at it with wonder and a little fear. This was the 
stuff that Black Aracnia ahd pumped through her to bring her back. 
She watched as the cut healed up almost right away. She screamed out. 
That scared her more than death did.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Black Aracnia smiled at Darkmouse, she was a tough little 
cookie to go 
> through all of this. "Very good. Take your time. Also, if you 
like,  can have 
> you placed in your quarters with a medical droid to watch over you."
> 
>     Paralysis looked at the virtual map and saw that several 
Allience members 
> were assulting the skeleton of the once proud, but now shattered 
Ark. He 
> slammed his fist down and cursed.
>     Aerostreak, Gunatix, and Grappler sat on the bridge, learning a 
few 
> things from Paralysis. They were as shocked as he was.
>     "Black Aracnia! The Allience is attacking the Ark!"
> 
>     Aracnia stormed out of Darkmouses room without saying goodbye. 
Right now 
> she had extreamly important matters to deal with. She ran down the 
corridor 
> and into the bridge. She saw firsthand what was going on.
>     "Well well, about time the Allience finally grows a backbone 
and dose 
> something! Send a transmission to Darkone telling him that you, 
Aerostreak, 
> Grappler, Adrax, and Autofire will be joining them. I will maintain 
things 
> here and join you. Quickstrike will man the computers. Also, Atma, 
Decadel, 
> and Hibichi..er..whatever, will join you as well. Hurry!" She 
ordered, 
> looking to her crew.
